long_description: Keep sweat out of your eyes or protect your skin from wind and sun with the Mountain Hardwear Way2Cool Bandana. Its versatility and soft fabric make it right for any adventure. Cool Q.(TM) ZERO stretch-polyester jersey is specially formulated to provide an ongoing cooling sensation with great coverage. Polyester jersey also wicks moisture away from skin, dries quickly and includes UPF 50+ sun protection. Wear the Mountain Hardwear Way2Cool Bandana as a neck and face gaiter or as a bandana.
